descriptionMarkdown:
Use this when you have a one-tile gap between two logistics networks, and you need to get some robots across the border so they can start automatically building stuff for you.  (You can also add pairs of requester-inserter-provider to move other materials across the border, or adapt this technique, your choice).

As an added bonus when one of your robots gets eaten by a biter, this will request exactly one robot to replace it, and automatically get that robot across the border and into the network!

---

#### Usage:

The requester should be in the "source" network, and the inserter should be in the gap between logistic networks.  Use the constant combinator to set the desired number of each kind of robot.

The walls are just to show where the one-tile gap between networks should go.  You can safely remove them.

*IMPORTANT*: The roboport, inserter, and belts are specially configured to read their contents in a way that makes this all work right.
title: Logistic zone gap - robot border crossing
